item.title: Devil wears prada(3)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 続きはこちら devil wear prada（3/7） devil wear prada（4/7） devil wear prada（5/7） 重要表現 baffling わからない saloon 酒場 I am on the board 大賛成 tough call 難しい選択 stick it out 耐え抜く drizzling 霧雨 Chapter 3 [Bell Dings] Mr. Ravitz. Nigel. Issue going well? Oh, yes. Our best September ever. Great. Heard Miranda killed autumn jackets and pulled up the Sedona shoot. What’s that costing me? About ,. Must have been some lousy jackets.

Everyone loved it. 485 00:29:11,240 –> 00:29:13,320 Everyone except me… 486 00:29:13,440 –> 00:29:17,400 because, sadly, I was not there. 487 00:29:17,480 –> 00:29:19,720 Miranda, I’m so sorry. 488 00:29:19,840 –> 00:29:21,720 Do you know why I hired you? 489 00:29:21,800 –> 00:29:24,760 I always hire the same girl-

item.title: Devil wears prada(5)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 続きはこちら devil wear prada（6/7） devil wear prada（7/7） 重要表現 Chapter 5 690 00:41:49,680 –> 00:41:51,560 Emily? 691 00:41:59,480 –> 00:42:03,480 Call James Holt’s office. Tell them I want to move the preview up to today at 12:30. 692 00:42:03,560 –> 00:42:06,240 Tell everybody else. Be ready to leave in half an hour. 693 00:42:06,360 –> 00:42:09,880 But we’re not expected until Tuesday. Did she say why? 694 00:42:09,960 –> 00:42:12,640 Yes.

item.title: Devil wears prada(6)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 続きはこちら devil wear prada（7/7） 重要表現 Chapter 6 839 00:50:51,960 –> 00:50:53,800 - Excuse me. - [Horn Honks] 840 00:51:04,200 –> 00:51:06,880 - Welcome to the St. Regis. May I assist you with anything? - Oh. Yes. 841 00:51:07,000 –> 00:51:09,880 - Uh, I’m meeting someone at the King Cole Bar. - Right this way. 842 00:51:12,400 –> 00:51:14,200 Hi. 843 00:51:14,320 –> 00:51:16,880 - You have one hour.

item.title: Devil wears prada(7)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 続きはこちら devil wear prada（3/11） devil wear prada（4/11） devil wear prada（5/11） 重要表現 Chapter 7 1011 01:01:35,280 –> 01:01:37,080 - Look at you. - Hello. 1012 01:01:37,200 –> 01:01:39,200 You’re-You’re a vision. 1013 01:01:39,320 –> 01:01:41,880 - Oh. [Scoffs] - Thank God I saved your job. 1014 01:01:42,000 –> 01:01:46,640 [Stammers, Chuckles] You know, I figured out a few things on my own too. 1015 01:01:46,720 –> 01:01:49,000 Turns out, I’m not as nice as you thought.

item.title: Devil wears prada(2)
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 続きはこちら devil wear prada（3/11） devil wear prada（4/11） devil wear prada（5/11） 重要表現 run errands 雑用する deal weth it やって！ Do you have some prior commitment? 先約があるの？ celluite セルライト Chapter2 (00:11:24~) Hello? Andrea, Miranda decided to kill the autumn jacket story for September… and she is pulling up the Sedona shoot from October. You need to come into the office right this second and pick up her coffee order on the way.

item.title: Devil wears prada
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: 続きはこちら devil wear prada（2/11） devil wear prada（3/11） devil wear prada（4/11） 重要表現 「not to mention a legend」 言うまでもなく伝説である 「million girls would kill for this job」 みんなが憧れる仕事だ 「paunchy」 太鼓腹の 「Don’t be a jerk」 ひどい人〜笑 Chapter 1 Hi. Uh, I have an appointment with Emily Charlton? Andrea Sachs? Yes. Great. Human Resources certainly has an odd sense of humor. Follow me. Okay, so I was Miranda’s second assistant…

item.title: Love, Rosie
item.author: youremail@domain.com (Some Person)
item.description: Love, Rosie Take a deep breath and start at the beginning. Tell them how we first met. Hi. Hi. Alex Stewart? Tell them that ever since we shared our dreams… Yeah! Yeah! I had a dream last night. …even Alex’s weirdest ones. You know a rowing boat? That little curvy bit the oar sits in? It’s called a rollock, by the way. A what? Rollock, like “bollock” with an “R.”
